meta.name: description
meta.content: Discover how Agora, a PA public cyber school, can deliver a personalized learning experience facilitated by certified teachers and in the comfort of your home!

p.strong: Enrolling at Agora is Quick and Convenient

ul.li: Go to https://agora.org/enrollment/ and create an account.
Within 24 hours an Enrollment Concierge will contact you to complete the process.
If you need immediate assistance, Call 844-462-4672 or email enrollment@agora.org
While our King of Prussia office is temporarily closed in accordance with state guidelines regarding social distancing, we'd be happy to assist you by phone or online.

tr.td: Come on in and meet live with an Agora Enrollment Concierge who will walk you through an overview of Agora and answer your questions. Find out how Agora can serve your family's educational needs, what programs we have to offer, and get information regarding the enrollment process. We are excited to show you around Agora and help you understand why we are #AgoraProud. Click HERE to join.

span.h2: Are You Returning to Agora Next Year?

tr.td:
Don't Delay ... Re-Register Today!
It's important to update your re-registration status so we know that you will be returning in the fall. All currently enrolled school families should re-register for the next academic year. The online re-registration portal is available in the OLS. The Learning Coach must log in to the OLS using their username and password to start the re-registration process. Click HERE for step by step instructions.

td.span: During these rough times we come together as a school community and thank the people who are working to help us through the COVID-19 pandemic. Sending cards/emails or posting signs/letters/drawings online (or elsewhere) is a great way to thank all those working tirelessly to keep the country running. Would you be willing to share what you did to show encouragement or support? Click HERE to share!

tr.td: Agora Cyber Charter School is committed to providing our families with information related to COVID-19 through various means of communication. In addition to the email messages sent to your Agora account, please refer to the following webpage for additional information:

span.img: Special interest groups are trying to take school choice rights away from Pennsylvania families. The Pennsylvania Coalition of Public Charter Schools (PCPCS) has created 143K Rising to give families a voice in the battle to protect public charter schools. Please join the coalition designed to help you have a stronger voice to protect public cyber charter schools. By joining the 143K Rising community, you will receive updates on the movement and its work to protect PA’s public charter schools for this generation of students and those to come. Go to 143KRising.com and join the movement now!

tr.td: Agora is dedicated to the vision of preparing all learners to achieve their highest potential through actively engaging in their own schooling, achieving their personal learning goals, and cultivating success as lifelong learners. To spur engagement in the learning process, Agora has partnered with Nearpod to provide our teachers with this interactive tool to spur learning in our synchronous live classrooms. Due to the innovative work of our dedicated teachers, Nearpod has recognized Agora as a Nearpod Certified School based on our excellent use of this program in setting the bar high for student engagement.

h2.a: Destinations Career Academy at Agora Cyber Charter School

span.img:
A tuition-free* online academy for grades 9–12, Destinations at Agora Cyber Charter Academy puts students on a path to success after high school. Destinations Career Academy at Agora Cyber Charter School is an innovative online program available to students through Pennsylvania that combines traditional high school academics with industry-relevant, career-focused electives—giving students a jump-start on their college and career goals.
While working toward their high school diplomas, students can choose from a variety of courses in these high-demand career fields:
Business - Careers in finance, marketing, and planning, organizing, directing, and evaluating business functions essential to efficient and productive business operations.
Health and Human Services - Careers in planning, managing, and providing therapeutic services, diagnostic services, health informatics, and support services.
Information Technology - Building linkages in IT occupations for entry level, technical, and professional careers related to the design, development, support, and management of hardware, software, multimedia, and systems integration services.
Pennsylvania-certified teachers provide live online instruction and tailor teaching to student needs. Students can participate in career-oriented clubs, gain workplace skills, and prepare to take industry-recognized certification exams in their chosen career path upon graduation.
Not only will graduates earn a high school diploma, but our students benefit from:
Internship support
Preparation for certification exams
Tallo, an online tool that connects students to careers, colleges, and scholarships
Project based learning that gives students real-world experience for future job environments
Interested in Destination at Agora – Call 855.403.6592 or https://start.destinationsacademy.com/dca-schoolindividual.html?st=pa&product=agora&leadsource=drtv
